name: Free Action
summary: Free Action (Abjuration, Enchantment) aus dem AD&D 2e Player's Handbook.

source_text.raw_block:
Free Action (Abjuration, Enchantment)
Sphere: Charm
Range: Touch
Components: V, S, M
Duration: 1 turn/level
Casting Time: 7
Area of Effect: Creature touched
Saving Throw: None
This spell enables the creature touched to
move and attack normally for the duration
Jf the spell, even under the influence of
217
breathing without further appropriate
ic.
The material component is a leather
thong, bound around the arm or similar
appendage, which disintegrates when th6
spell expires.
